member.name: T:R2API.ScriptableObjects.ArtifactCode
member.summary: Scriptable object to ease the creation of Artifact codes.

member.name: F:R2API.ScriptableObjects.ArtifactCode.middleRow
member.summary: Compound values that represent the middle 3 compounds. For a list of accepted vanilla compound values, check ArtifactCodeAPI.CompoundValues

member.name: F:R2API.ScriptableObjects.ArtifactCode.bottomRow
member.summary: Compound values that represent the bottom 3 compounds. For a list of accepted vanila compound values, check ArtifactCodeAPI.CompoundValues

member.name: F:R2API.ScriptableObjects.ArtifactCode.hashAsset
member.summary: The Sha256HashAsset stored in this Scriptable Object.

member.name: M:R2API.ScriptableObjects.ArtifactCode.Start
member.summary: Creates the Sha256HashAsset

member.name: F:R2API.ArtifactCodeAPI.PluginGUID
member.summary: GUID of the plugin, usually used for the Attribute.

member.name: M:R2API.ArtifactCodeAPI.AddCode(RoR2.ArtifactDef,RoR2.Sha256HashAsset)
member.summary: Add a custom Artifact code to the SkyMeadow Artifact portal dialer. The artifactDef must exist within the initialized ArtifactCatalog for it to properly added to the portal dialer.
member.param: The artifactDef tied to the artifact code.

member.name: M:R2API.ArtifactCodeAPI.AddCode(RoR2.ArtifactDef,R2API.ScriptableObjects.ArtifactCode)
member.summary: Add a custom Artifact code to the SkyMeadow Artifact portal dialer. The artifactDef must exist within the initialized ArtifactCatalog for it to properly added to the portal dialer.
member.param: The artifactDef tied to the artifact code.
The artifactCode written in the ArtifactCodeScriptableObject.

member.name: M:R2API.ArtifactCodeAPI.AddCode(RoR2.ArtifactDef,System.UInt64,System.UInt64,System.UInt64,System.UInt64)
member.summary: Add a custom Artifact code to the SkyMeadow Artifact portal dialer. The artifactDef must exist within the initialized Artifactcatalog for it to be properly added to the portal dialer.
member.param: The artifactDef tied to the artifact code.
The values printed by R2API when a code is inputted.
The values printed by R2API when a code is inputted.
The values printed by R2API when a code is inputted.
The values printed by R2API when a code is inputted.

member.name: M:R2API.ArtifactCodeAPI.AddCode(RoR2.ArtifactDef,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Add a custom Artifact code to the SkyMeadow Artifact portal dialer. The artifactDef must exist within the initialized ArtifactCatalog for it to be properly added to the portal dialer.
member.param: The artifactDef tied to the artifact code.
An IEnumerable of type "int" with a size of 9 filled with compound values.

member.name: M:R2API.ArtifactCodeAPI.AddCompound(RoR2.ArtifactCompoundDef)
member.summary: Add a custom Artifact Compound to the SkyMeadow's Artifact Buttons.
member.param: The Artifact Compound to add. The value in the def must be unique, otherwise if a duplicate is found, it doesnt add the compound.
member.returns: True if added to the button prefab, false otherwise.

member.name: M:R2API.ArtifactCodeAPI.AddCompound(System.Int32,UnityEngine.Material,UnityEngine.GameObject)
member.summary: Add a custom Artifact Compound to the SkyMeadow's Artifact Buttons
member.param: The Decal Material of the Compound.
The Model Prefab of the Compound.

member.name: T:R2API.ArtifactCodeAPI.CompoundValues
member.summary: Contains the values of Vanilla risk of rain 2 Artifact Compounds.

member.name: F:R2API.ArtifactCodeAPI.CompoundValues.Empty
member.summary: Value of the Empty compound.

member.name: F:R2API.ArtifactCodeAPI.CompoundValues.Square
member.summary: Value of the Square compound.

member.name: F:R2API.ArtifactCodeAPI.CompoundValues.Circle
member.summary: Value of the Circle compound.

member.name: F:R2API.ArtifactCodeAPI.CompoundValues.Triangle
member.summary: Value for the Triangle compound.

member.name: F:R2API.ArtifactCodeAPI.CompoundValues.Diamond
member.summary: Value for the Diamond compound.

member.name: F:R2API.ArtifactCodeAPI.PluginVersion
member.summary: Version of the plugin, should be matching with the thunderstore package.

member.name: T:R2API.AutoVersionGen.AutoVersionAttribute
member.summary: Add a PluginVersion field to the attribut-ed class filled from the thunderstore.toml versionNumber field
